item.title: Late-Night Short Note: University Application
item.description: I just helped one of my classmates practice her presentation and watched her present her work. It’s an entrance test for a Dutch university and the real thing is coming tomorrow. And it’s not simply her presenting to the teachersâ€”she’ll present to other applicants, listen to them, talk to them, and the teachers are going to ask her questions. It’s going to take her a whole morning. That Dutch university has so many strict entrance requirements.
